diagnosis.final_diagnosis: HIV infection with AIDS and pneumocystis pneumonia
differential_diagnosis: Opportunistic infections (Pneumocystis pneumonia, CMV pneumonia, RSV, etc.)
diagnosis.diagnostic_reasoning: The patient presented with progressive dyspnea, hypoxemia, and a history of immunosuppression from glucocorticoids. Imaging revealed diffuse, isolated ground-glass opacities. The immunofluorescence assay for Pneumocystis jirovecii was positive, and HIV testing was positive, establishing the diagnosis of pneumocystis pneumonia and AIDS.
